tgt_original: 「菩薩摩訶薩行六波羅蜜時，離諸欲，離諸惡不善法，有覺有觀，離生喜樂入初禪乃至入第四禪中，以慈廣大，無二、無量，無怨、無恨、無惱心行，遍滿一方、二三四方、四維、上下，遍一切世間。

src_original: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva etaiś ca dhyānair etābhiś cārūpyasamāpattibhir viharati,  sa etā dhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamāno vyuttiṣṭhamānaś cākāśākāraliṅganimittāni manasikaroti,  prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tāni ca kuśalamūlāny anyāni ca sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,  iyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā.
tgt_original: 是菩薩入禪時、起時，諸禪、無量心及支，共一切眾生，迴向薩婆若，是名菩薩摩訶薩禪波羅蜜發趣大乘。

src_original: tatra katamo dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名畢法性三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā dharmadhātor niścayaṃ gacchati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧決定知法性，是名畢法性三昧。 云何名畢幢相三昧？ 住是三昧能持諸三昧幢，是名畢幢相三昧。 云何名金剛三昧？

src_original: ayam ucyate dharmadhātuniyato nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能破諸三昧，是名金剛三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo dharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名入法印三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrāṃ praviśati,  ayam ucyate dharmapraveśamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧入諸法印，是名入法印三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名三昧王安立三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ rājasupratiṣṭhānena pratitiṣṭhati,  ayam ucyate samādhirājasupratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，一切諸三昧中安立住如王，是名三昧王安立三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名放光三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmīn avasṛjati,  ayam ucyate raśmipramukto nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，能放光照諸三昧，是名放光三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名力進三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ balavyūhaṃ dhārayati,  ayam ucyate balavyūho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧能作力勢，是名力進三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ samudgato nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名高出三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā samādhayaḥ samudāgacchanti,  ayam ucyate samudgato nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能增長諸三昧，是名高出三昧。

src_original: samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām adhivacananāmadheyāni praviśati,  ayam ucyate adhivacanasaṃpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能釋諸三昧名字，是名釋名字三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名觀方三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ diśo vyavalokyante,  ayam ucyate digvilokito nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能觀諸三昧方，是名觀方三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名陀羅尼印三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrā ādhārayati,  ayam ucyate ādhāraṇamudro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧持諸三昧印，是名陀羅尼印三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'saṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無誑三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayo na pramuṣyante,  ayam ucyate asaṃpramuṣito nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧不欺誑，是名無誑三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇasāgaramudro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名攝諸法海三昧？

src_original: tatra katamo niścitto nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無心三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā nihīnāṃś cittacaitasikān dharmān na pravartayati tenocyate niścitto nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧心心數法不行，是名無心三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名淨燈三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ dhārayati tenocyate vimalapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧中作明如燈，是名淨燈三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'nantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無邊明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā anantāṃ prabhāṃ karoti tenocyate 'nantaprabho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧與諸三昧作無邊明，是名無邊明三昧。 云何名能作明三昧？ 住是三昧即時能為諸三昧作明，是名能作明三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ prabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名普照明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ śuddhasamatām anuprāpnoti,
tgt_original: 住是三昧即能照諸三昧門，是名普照明三昧。 云何名堅淨諸三昧三昧？ 住是三昧能堅淨諸三昧相，是名堅淨諸三昧三昧。 云何名無垢明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ balam ākarṣayati sarvasamādhīn prabhāvayati,  tenocyate vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能除諸三昧垢，亦能照一切三昧，是名無垢明三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名歡喜三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ ratim anubhavati,  tenocyate ratikaro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能受諸三昧喜，是名歡喜三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名電光三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ karoti,  tenocyate vidyutpradīpo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧照諸三昧如電光，是名電光三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'kṣayo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無盡三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ naivākṣayaṃ na kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate 'kṣayo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧不見盡，是名無盡三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名威德三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhimaṇḍalāni dhārayati,  ayam ucyate vajramaṇḍalo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧威德照然，是名威德三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'kṣayāpagato nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名離盡三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ kṣayaṃ samanupaśyati tathā ca paśyati yathā aṇum api dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧盡，是名離盡三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名不退三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn vivṛtān samanupaśyati,  tenocyate vivṛto nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能不見諸三昧退，是名不退三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名日燈三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ raśmimukham avabhāsayati,  tenocyate sūryapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ,
tgt_original: 住是三昧放光照諸三昧門，是名日燈三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaś candravimalo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名月淨三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām andhakāraṃ vidhamayati,  tenocyate candravimalo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能除諸三昧闇，是名月淨三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ śuddhaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名淨明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pratilabhate,  tenocyate śuddhaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧得四無礙智，是名淨明三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ālokakaro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名能作明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhimukhānām ālokaṃ karoti,  tenocyate kārākāro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，於諸三昧門能作明，是名能作明三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā (PvsP1-2: 70)  sarvadharmān nirvidhyate samādhim api na samanupaśyati,  tenocyate vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧能貫達諸法，亦不見達，是名如金剛三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaś cittasthitir nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名心住三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā cittaṃ na varṇayati na vivartate na pratibhāsate na vighātam āpatsyate na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati cittam iti,  tenocyate cittasthitir nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，心不動不轉不惱，亦不念有是心，是名心住三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ samantāloko nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名普明三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ samantālokaṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate samantāloko nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧普見諸三昧明，是名普明三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名安立三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiṣu pratiṣṭhito bhavati,  tenocyate supratiṣṭhito nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，於諸三昧安立不動，是名安立三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo ratnakoṭir nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名寶聚三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayaḥ samantād ratnakotir iva saṃdṛśyante,
tgt_original: 住是三昧普見諸三昧如見寶聚，是名寶聚三昧。

src_original: tenocyate ratnakoṭir nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 云何名妙法印三昧？ 住是三昧能印諸三昧，以無印印故，是名妙法印三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā na kañcid dharmaṃ samatānirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 云何名法等三昧？ 住是三昧觀諸法等、無法不等，是名法等三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo ratijaho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名斷喜三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiratiḥ sarvadharmaratīr jahāti,  tenocyate ratijaho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧斷一切法中喜，是名斷喜三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmodgatapūrṇo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名到法頂三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmaiś codgacchati sarvadharmaiś cāpūryate,  tenocyate sarvadharmodgatapūrṇo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧滅諸法闇，亦在諸三昧上，是名到法頂三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名能散三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhibhiḥ sarvadharmān vikirati vidhamayati,  tenocyate vikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧中能破散諸法，是名能散三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmapadaprabhedo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名分別諸法句三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā (PvsP1-2: 71)
tgt_original: 住是三昧能分別諸三昧諸法句，是名分別諸法句三昧。 云何名字等相三昧？ 住是三昧得諸三昧字等，是名字等相三昧。 云何名離字三昧？

src_original: tenocyate 'kṣarāpagato nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，諸三昧中乃至不見一字，是名離字三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ārambaṇacchedo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名斷緣三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām ārambanaṃ cchidyate,  tenocyate ārambaṇacchedo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧斷諸三昧緣，是名斷緣三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'vikāro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名不壞三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ vikāraṃ nopalabhate,  tenocyate 'vikāro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不得諸法變異，是名不壞三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'prakāro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無種相三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakāram api nopalabhate,  tenocyate 'prakāro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸法種種，是名無種相三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo nāmanimittāpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ?  yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ nāmanimittāni nopalabhate,
tgt_original: 云何名無處行三昧？ 住是三昧不見諸三昧處，是名無處行三昧。 云何名離曚昧三昧？

src_original: tenocyate nāmanimittāpraveśo nāma samādhiḥ.  tatra katamo 'niketacārī nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 住是三昧離諸三昧微闇，是名離曚昧三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ timirāpagato nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無去三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ cāritraṃ samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見一切三昧去相，是名無去三昧。 云何名不變異三昧？

src_original: tenocyate 'nantapratibhāso nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 云何名無量辯三昧？ 住是三昧，於諸法中得無量辯，是名無量辯三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'samasamo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無等等三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ samasamatāṃ na pratilabhate,  tenocyate 'samasamo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，諸三昧中得無等等相，是名無等等三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvadharmātikramaṇo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名度諸法三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvatraidhātukaṃ samatikrāmati,  tenocyate sarvadharmātikramaṇo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，度一切三昧，是名度諸法三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ paricchedakaro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名分別諸法三昧？

src_original: yatra samā adhau sthitvā sarvasamadhīnāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca paricchedaṃ kariṣyati,  tenocyate paricchedakaro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，諸三昧及諸法分別見，是名分別諸法三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo vimativikiraṇo nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名散疑三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhivimativikiraṇam anuprāpnoti,  tenocyate niradhiṣṭhāno nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧得散諸法疑，是名散疑三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ekavyūho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無住處三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā na kasyacid dharmasya dvayatāṃ samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸法住處，是名無住處三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ cākārābhinirhāraṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate ākārābhinirhāro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸行生，是名生行三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ekākāravyūho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名一行三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām ekākāratāṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate ekākāravyūho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧此岸、彼岸，是名一行三昧。 云何名不一行三昧？ 住是三昧不見諸三昧一相，是名不一行三昧。

src_original: tatra katama ākārānavakāro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名妙行三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmāṇām advayatāṃ samanupaśyati,  tenocyate ākārānavakāro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧二相，是名妙行三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo nirvedhikasarvabhāvatalādhikāro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名達一切有底散三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamadhīnāṃ nirvedhikaṃ jñānam anuprāpnoti yasyānuprāptito na kaścin na pratividhyate,
tgt_original: 住是三昧入一切有一切三昧，智慧通達亦無所達，是名達一切有底散三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ saṃketarutāni praviśati,  tenocyate saṃketarutapraveśo nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 云何名入名語三昧？ 住是三昧入一切三昧名語，是名入名語三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo gīrghoṣākṣaravimukto nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名離音聲字語三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn akṣaravimuktān samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧音聲字語，是名離音聲字語三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīṃs tejasāvabhāsayati patati virocate,  tenocyate jvalanolko nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 云何名然炬三昧？ 住是三昧威德照明如炬，是名然炬三昧。

src_original: tatrakatamo lakṣaṇapariśodhano nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名淨相三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvalakṣaṇāni pariśodhayati,  tenocyate lakṣaṇapariśodhano nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧淨諸三昧相，是名淨相三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'nabhilakṣito nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名破相三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīn abhilakṣayati abhilakṣayati,  tenocyate 'nabhilakṣito nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧相，是名破相三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvākāravaropeto nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名一切種妙足三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvākāravaropeto bhavati,  tenocyate sarvākāravaropeto nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧一切諸三昧種皆具足，是名一切種妙足三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名不喜苦樂三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhiṣu sukhaduḥkhāni na samanupaśyati,  tenocyate sarvasukhaduḥkhanirabhinandī nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧苦樂，是名不喜苦樂三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo dhāraṇīpratipattir nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名無盡相三昧？

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvasamyaktvamithyātvasaṃgraho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧盡，是名無盡相三昧。 云何名陀羅尼三昧？ 住是三昧能持諸三昧，是名陀羅尼三昧。 云何名攝諸邪正相三昧？

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvarodhanirodhapraśamano nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名滅憎愛三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā samādhṃāṃ samyaktvamithyātvāni na samanupaśyati,  tenocyate sarvasamyaktvamithyātvasaṃgraho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧不見邪正相，是名攝諸邪正相三昧。

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ rodhanirodhān na samanupaśyati,  tenocyate sarvarodhanirodhapraśamano nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧不見諸三昧憎愛，是名滅憎愛三昧。 云何名逆順三昧？ 住是三昧，不見諸法、諸三昧逆順，是名逆順三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'nusārapratisāro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名淨光三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām anusārapratisārān na samanupaśyati,
tgt_original: 住是三昧不得諸三昧明垢，是名淨光三昧。

src_original: tenocyate 'nusārapratisāro nāma samādhiḥ.  tatra katamo vimalaprabho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名堅固三昧？ 住是三昧不得諸三昧不堅固，是名堅固三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sāravatī nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名滿月淨光三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya sarvasamādhayaḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 住是三昧諸三昧滿足如月十五日，是名滿月淨光三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo mahāvyūho nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名大莊嚴三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā tasya sarvasamādhayo mahāvyūhena samanvāgatā bhavanti,  tenocyate mahāvyūho nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧大莊嚴成就諸三昧，是名大莊嚴三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ sarvākāraprabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名能照一切世三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ ca prabhāṃ karoti,  tenocyate sarvākāraprabhākaro nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧，諸三昧及一切法能照，是名能照一切世三昧。

src_original: tatra katamaḥ samādhisamatā nāma samādhiḥ?
tgt_original: 云何名三昧等三昧？

src_original: yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnāṃ na vikṣepaṃ naikāgratāṃ ca samanupaśyati,  tenocyate samādhisamatā nāma samādhiḥ.
tgt_original: 住是三昧於諸三昧不得定亂相，是名三昧等三昧。

src_original: tatra katamo 'raṇasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ?  yatra samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhayo na raṇanti,  tenocyate 'raṇasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ.  tatra katamo 'raṇasaraṇasarvasamavasaraṇo nāma samādhiḥ? yatra (PvsP1-2: 75)  samādhau sthitvā sarvasamādhīnām araṇasaraṇasarvasamavasaraṇatām anuprāpnoti,
tgt_original: 云何名攝一切有諍無諍三昧？

src_original: bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  na ca kāyasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩，內身中循身觀，亦無身覺，以不可得故；

src_original: adhyātmabahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  na ca kāyasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac (PvsP1-2: 76)
tgt_original: 外身中、內外身中循身觀，亦無身覺，以不可得故。

src_original: cānupalambhayogena,  ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye,
tgt_original: 勤精進一心，除世間貪憂。

src_original: evam adhyātmaṃ vedanāsu citte,  adhyātmadharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī viharati,  na ca dharmasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena,  bahirdhādharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī viharati,  na ca dharmasahagatān vitarkān vitarkayati tac cānupalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 內受、內心、內法，外受、外心、外法，內外受、內外心、內外法，循法觀，亦無法覺，以不可得故。

src_original: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmakāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 「須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩，云何內身中循身觀？ 須菩提！

src_original: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś caraṃś carāmīti prajānāti,  sthitaḥ sthito 'smīti prajānāti,  śayānaḥ śayito 'smīti prajānāti,  yathā yathāsya kāyaḥ sthito bhavati praṇītam apraṇītaṃ vā tathā tathainaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩行時知行，住時知住，坐時知坐，臥時知臥，如身所行，如是知。

src_original: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmakāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩如是內身中循身觀，勤精進一心，除世間貪憂，以不可得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmakāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！

src_original: abhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānacārī bhavati,  ālokite vilokite samiñjite prasārite saṃghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇe aśite pīte khādite  śayite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇīmbhāve
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若來若去，視瞻一心，屈申俯仰，服僧伽梨，執持衣鉢，飲食、臥息、坐立、睡覺、語默，入禪、出禪，亦常一心。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ smṛta āśvasan smṛta āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩內身中循身觀時，一心念：

src_original: smṛtaḥ praśvasan smṛtaḥ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 『入息時知入息，出息時知出息；

src_original: dīrghaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghaṃ vā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan hrasvaṃ vā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 入息長時知入息長，出息長時知出息長； 入息短時知入息短，出息短時知出息短。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte cakraṃ bhrāmayan kumbhakāraḥ kumbhakārāntevāsī vā dīrgham āvidhyan dīrgham āvidhyāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  hrasvam āvidhyaṃ hrasvam āvidhyāmīti (PvsP1-2: 77)
tgt_original: 譬如旋師，若旋師弟子，繩長知長，繩短知短。

src_original: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ smṛta āśvasan smṛta āśvāsāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 』菩薩摩訶薩，亦如是一心念：

src_original: smṛtaḥ praśvasan smṛtaḥ praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  dīrghaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghaṃ vā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,  hrasvaṃ vā āśvasan hrasvaṃ vā āśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
tgt_original: 『入息時知入息，出息時知出息； 入息長時知入息長，出息長時知出息長； 入息短時知入息短，出息短時知出息短。

src_original: hrasvaṃ vā praśvasan hrasvaṃ vā praśvasāmīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīyaloke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 』如是，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩內身中循身觀，勤精進一心，除世間貪憂，以不可得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩觀身四大，作是念：

src_original: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuḥ,
tgt_original: 『身中有地大、水大、火大、風大。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakāntevāsī vā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa gāṃ hanyāt gāṃ hatvā catvāri phalakāni kuryāt,  catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣeta sthito vā atha vā niṣaṇṇaḥ,
tgt_original: 』譬如屠牛師、若屠牛弟子，以刀殺牛，分作四分，作四分已，若立若坐，觀此四分。

src_original: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦如是，行般若波羅蜜時，種種觀身四大：

src_original: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 地大、水大、火大、風大。 如是，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩內身中循身觀，以不可得故。 「復次，須菩提！

src_original: ūrdhvapādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśucer
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩觀內身，從足至頂，周匝薄皮，種種不淨充滿身中；

src_original: yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
tgt_original: 作是念：

src_original: santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantās tvakcarmamāṃsasnāyavaḥ śoṇitam asthimajjāhṛdayaṃ  vṛkkā yakṛtklomaplīhā āmamantrāṇi antraguṇā udaraṃ purīṣaṃ mūtram aśrusvedo medaḥ  kheṭaḥ siṃhāṇakaṃ pūyaṃ lohitaṃ pittaṃ śleṣmā vasā malo mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthakaṃ  karṇagūthakam ity asmin kāye yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,
tgt_original: 『身中有髮、毛、爪、齒、薄皮、厚皮、筋、肉、骨、髓、脾、腎、心、肝、肺、小腸、大腸、胃、胞、𡱁、尿、垢、汗、目、淚、涕、唾、膿、血、黃、白痰、陰、肪、𦙽、腦、膜。

src_original: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte karmakārasya mūtoḍiḥ pūrṇo nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ brīhīnāṃ  tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudgānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ masūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇām apyi
tgt_original: 』譬如田夫倉中，隔盛雜穀，種種充滿，稻、麻、黍、粟、豆、麥；

src_original: anyaś cakṣuṣmān puruṣo muktvā pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ,  evaṃ jānīyād ayaṃ śāliḥ ayaṃ brihī (PvsP1-2: 78)  amī tilāḥ amī taṇḍulāḥ amī mudgāḥ amī māṣāḥ amī yavāḥ ami godhūmāḥ amī masūrāḥ amī sarṣapā iti,
tgt_original: 明眼之人，開倉即知是麻、是黍、是稻、是粟、是麥、是豆，分別悉知。

src_original: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam eva kāyam ūrdhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakān nakharomatvakcarmāntaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate,  santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantās tvakcarmamāṃsasnāyavaḥ śoṇitam asthimajjāhṛdayaṃ  vṛkkāyakṛtklomaplīhā āmam antrāṇi antraguṇā udaraṃ purīṣaṃ mūtram aśrusvedo medaḥ  kheṭaḥ siṃhāṇakaṃ pūyaṃ lohitaṃ pittaṃ śleṣmā vasā malo mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthakaṃ  karṇagūthakam. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaṃ
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩亦如是觀是身，從足至頂，周匝薄皮，種種不淨充滿身中，髮毛、爪齒，乃至腦膜。 如是，須菩提！

src_original: kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩觀內身，勤精進一心，除世間貪憂，以不可得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！

src_original: śmaśāne 'paviddhāni śivapathikāyām ujjhitāni ekāhamṛtāni vā dvyahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni  vā caturahamṛtāni vā pañcāhamṛtāni vā ādhmātakāni vinīlakāni vā vipūyakāni vā vikhāditakāni
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩若見棄死人身，一日、二日，至于五日，膖脹、青瘀，膿汁流出； 自念：

src_original: vā vikṣiptakāni vā sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati,  ayam api kāya evaṃ dharmā evaṃ svabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 『我身亦如是相、如是法，未脫此法。 』如是，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩內身中循身觀，勤精進一心，除世間貪憂，以不可得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāna utsṛṣṭāni  ṣaḍrātramṛtāni vā saptarātramṛtāni vā tāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair  vā sṛgālair vā vṛkair vā śvabhir vā tad anyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ khādyamānāni
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩若見棄死人身，若六日、若七日，烏、鵄、雕、鷲、犲、狼、狐、狗如是等種種禽獸爴裂食之；

src_original: ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,  ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 『我身如是相、如是法，未脫此法。 』如是，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩內身中循身觀，勤精進一心，除世間貪憂，以不可得故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāni tāni paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāna ujjhitāni khāditakāni aśucīni vipūtīni durgandhīni,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩若見棄死人身，禽獸食已，不淨爛臭；

src_original: sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati,  ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 自念： 『我身如是相、如是法，未脫此法。

src_original: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 』乃至除世間貪憂。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩若見棄死人身，骨鎖血肉塗染，筋骨相連； 自念：

src_original: ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatām avyativṛttaḥ. evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahirdhākāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
tgt_original: 『我身如是相、如是法，未脫此法。

src_original: ātāpī saṃprajānan smṛtimān vinīya loke 'bhidhyādaurmanasye.
tgt_original: 』乃至除世間貪憂。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāni tāni paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām  asthisaṃkalām apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩若見棄死人身，骨瑣血肉已離，筋骨相連； 自念：
